item.description:
Join me for the Adopt a Road Project

It is a Spring cleanup of West Road in South Windsor.

This takes about 90 minutes to help make South Windsor a little cleaner. Our volunteers will then be taken out to Campions Pizza after the event for dinner.


We will meet at West Street in south windsor - Park in the sand across from the parking lot of the new firehouse.

it is on the Corner of West St and Sullivan Ave.

across the street from the new firehouse.
The official address is 765 Sullivan Avenue South Windsor, CT

 

idealy 4 volunteers is good, 2 on each side of the road...
item.name: Adopt a Road
